name: Daebellum
description:
We would greatly appreciate if after playing our prototype could you please fill our quick survey out: https://forms.gle/BejsLp6WGK2ZuvhB7

Thanks

Install instructions

Download the .zip folder

Extract it

Run Daebellum.exe

Controller recommended 

Keyboard & Mouse Keybinds

Move Left: A
Move Right: D
Climb Ladder: W
Slide/Dash: S while moving
Jump: Space
Light Attack: Left Mouse
Heavy Attack: Right Mouse
Interact: Enter
